metadata.title: CVE-2023-40414 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in watchOS 10, iOS 17 and iPadOS 17, tvOS 17, macOS Sonoma14, Safari 17. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
